requirement.title: IMU
requirement.description: The FC shall be equipped with an IMU.

requirement.title: Pitot-Sensor
requirement.description: The NAV shall be equipped with a Pitot tube based sensor for airspeed measurements.

requirement.title: GPS Sensor
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with a GPS sensor.

requirement.title: Barometer
requirement.description: The NAV shall be equipped with a barometric altimeter.

requirement.title: LIDAR
requirement.description: The NAV shall be equipped with LIDAR for altitude measurements.

requirement.title: Voltage and Current Sensor
requirement.description: The PDB shall be able to measure the following physical quantities: \begin{itemize} \item Battery Voltage \item Battery Current \item 5V-Rail Voltage \item 5V-Rail Current \end{itemize}

requirement.title: Cellular Module
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with a transceiver for cellular communication.

requirement.title: Energy Storage
requirement.description: The AC shall provide sufficient energy for $\SI{2}{\hour}$ at $\SI{15}{\meter \per \second}$.

requirement.title: Motor Characterization
requirement.description: The AC shall react to motor commands with a deterministic thrust, only influenced by the command, the load of the motor and the battery voltage. The influence of all other factors should be less than $10\%$ under normal operating conditions. TODO what are those?

requirement.title: Elevon Actuator Performance
requirement.description: The AC shall set the position of the control surfaces in accordance with the received command TODO performance.

requirement.title: Control Surfaces
requirement.description: The AF shall be equipped with two elevons which allow for control of both the roll and pitch axis.

requirement.title: Lift
requirement.description: The AF shall provide lift to carry a total system weight of $\SI{2.5}{\kg}$ at $\SI{15}{\meter \per \second}$

requirement.title: Mounting
requirement.description: The AF shall provide mounting places for the following components: \begin{itemize} \item SA \item PW \item FC \item FCP \item PDB \item NAV \end{itemize}

requirement.title: IMU Measurements
requirement.description: The FCS shall read measurement the following data around all three axis \begin{itemize} \item Orientation angle \item Rotation-rate \item Acceleration \end{itemize} every $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Airspeed Measurements
requirement.description: The airspeed shall be measured by the NAVS every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$.

requirement.title: GPS Measurement
requirement.description: The FCPS shall query the GPS sensor for new data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Barometer measurement
requirement.description: The NAVS shall read the altimeter every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Lidar measurements
requirement.description: The NAVS shall read the LIDAR every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Voltage and Current Monitoring
requirement.description: The PDBS shall measure the following physical quantities \begin{itemize} \item Battery Voltage \item Battery Current \item 5V-Rail Voltage \item 5V-Rail Current \end{itemize} every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$

requirement.title: Motor Command Execution
requirement.description: The EP shall react on every motor command in at most $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: State Estimation
requirement.description: The FCPS shall filter the IMU and pitot data to guarantee \begin{itemize} \item an acceleration with $2 \sigma_a \le \SI{0.6}{\meter \per \second^2}$ \item the orientation with $2 \sigma_\text{orientation} \le \SI{5}{\degree}$ \item the velocity with $2 \sigma_v \le \hat{v} \cdot 10 \%$ \item the position with $2 \sigma_{x,y} \le \SI{1}{\meter}$. \item the altitude over the ground with $2 \sigma_h \le h_\text{tol}$, with $h_\text{tol} = \SI{2}{\meter}$ for $h \geq \SI{20}{\meter}$ and $h_\text{tol} = \SI{0.2}{\meter}$ otherwise. \end{itemize} Note: the accuracy requirements are reformulated as requirements regarding the standard deviation, using a confidence bound of $95\% \equiv 2 \sigma$.

requirement.title: Reading Mission Configuration
requirement.description: The FCPS shall read a list of waypoints and a target at startup. Both the waypoints and the target consists of the following information: \begin{itemize} \item Latitude \item Longitude \item Altitude above sea level \item Optional: Heading at which to pass the point \end{itemize}

requirement.title: Mission State
requirement.description: The FCPS shall call the correct mission subprogram and switch mission state depending on the output of this subprogram.

requirement.title: Launch Detection
requirement.description: The FCPS shall use the estimated state to signal a launch if the acceleration is larger than $\SI{6}{\meter \per \second}$.

requirement.title: Waypoint Handling
requirement.description: The FCPS shall send the next waypoint as input to the position control and detect when a waypoint was hit and then forwards the next waypoint.

requirement.title: Velocity Controller
requirement.description: The FCPS shall be able to find a motor command such that the relative error between estimated velocity and desired velociy is less than $10\%$ after $\SI{10}{\second}$.

requirement.title: Attitude Controller
requirement.description: The FCS shall compute a actuator command every $\SI{20}{\milli \second}$, such that the error between estimated attitude and actual attitude is less than $\SI{10}{\degree}$ after $\SI{10}{\second}$.

requirement.title: Position Controller
requirement.description: The FCPS shall find a dynamically feasible trajectory of attitudes and velocities, such that the distance between the estimated position and the desired position becomes less than $\SI{1}{\meter}$.

requirement.title: Altitude Controller
requirement.description: The FCPS shall control the altitude such that the error between estimated and desired altitude is less than $\SI{0.5}{\meter}$.

requirement.title: Debug Data Collection
requirement.description: The FCPS shall collect the following data: \begin{itemize} \item All data from the FCS \item All data from the PDBS \item All data from the NAVS \item The estimated state \item The current flight state \end{itemize}

requirement.title: Debug Display Visualization
requirement.description: The DDS shall be able to visualize all debug data.

requirement.title: Override Command
requirement.description: The FCS shall use the override information as command if the override switch is activated.

requirement.title: Arm Command
requirement.description: The FCS shall always send the motor command 0 if the arm switch is not activated.

requirement.title: FC-FCP Interface
requirement.description: The FC shall be equipped with an interface to send and receive data to the FCP

requirement.title: FCP-FC Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to send and receive data to the FC

requirement.title: NAV-FCP Interface
requirement.description: The NAV shall be equipped with an interface to send data to the FCP

requirement.title: FCP-NAV Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to receive data from the NAV

requirement.title: PDB-FCP Interface
requirement.description: The PDB shall be equipped with an interface to send data to the FCP

requirement.title: FCP-PDB Interface
requirement.description: The FCP shall be equipped with an interface to receive data from the PDB

requirement.title: Servo and Motor Interface
requirement.description: The FC shall be equipped with an interface to send commands to the CS and EP

requirement.title: FC-RX Interface
requirement.description: The FC shall be able to receive commands from the RX.

requirement.title: FCS data transmission
requirement.description: The FCS shall transmit IMU data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$ to the FCPS.

requirement.title: FCS data reception
requirement.description: The FCPS shall be able to receive FCS data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: NAVS data transmission
requirement.description: The NAVS shall transmit the following data \begin{itemize} \item Velocity \item Barometric altitude \item LIDAR \end{itemize} every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: NAVS data reception
requirement.description: The FCPS shall receive the NAVS data every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: PDBS data transmission
requirement.description: The PDBS shall transmit the measured data every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$ to the FCPS.

requirement.title: PDBS data reception
requirement.description: The FCPS shall be able to receive PDB data every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$ from the PDBS.

requirement.title: RX reception
requirement.description: The RX shall receive the information sent by the TX and forward it to the FCP.

requirement.title: Debug Data Transmission
requirement.description: The FCPS shall transmit the collected debug data every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$ via the cellular connection.

requirement.title: Debug Display Data Reception
requirement.description: The DDS shall be able to receive the debug data every $\SI{100}{\milli \second}$ via the cellular connection.

requirement.title: Motor Setpoint Receive
requirement.description: The FCS shall be able to receive a motor setpoint every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirement.title: Motor Command
requirement.description: The FCS shall transmit every motor setpoint as a command to the EP at most $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$ after reception.

requirement.title: Orientation Setpoint Transmission
requirement.description: The FCPS shall transmit every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$ the orientation and calculated by the position controller for the current timestep.

requirement.title: Orientation Setpoint Reception
requirement.description: The FCS shall receive the orientation setpoint from the FCPS every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: Motor Setpoint Transmission
requirement.description: The FCPS shall transmit the calculated motor setpoint every $\SI{100}{\milli\second}$

requirement.title: Servo Command Transmission
requirement.description: The FCS shall transmit the computed servo command every $\SI{20}{\milli\second}$.

requirement.title: TX command transmission
requirement.description: The TX shall transmit the following information: \begin{itemize} \item Motor arm switch position \item Manual override switch position \item Motor setpoint override \item Servo setpoint override \end{itemize}

requirement.title: Override reception
requirement.description: The FCS shall be able to receive the override information from the RX.
